import Mathlib

open Filter

variable {x : ‚Ñï ‚Üí ‚Ñù}

def y (n : ‚Ñï) := max (x n) 0

/-- If x_n ‚Üí l then max(x_n,0) ‚Üí max(l,0). -/
theorem tendsto_y (l : ‚Ñù) (h : Tendsto x atTop (ùìù l)) : Tendsto y atTop (ùìù (max l 0)) := by sorry

/-- In particular, the limit of y_n = max(x_n,0) is ‚â• 0. -/
theorem lim_y_nonneg (l : ‚Ñù) (h : Tendsto x atTop (ùìù l)) : 0 ‚â§ (max l 0) := by sorry

import Mathlib

variable {x : ‚Ñï ‚Üí ‚Ñù}

def y (n : ‚Ñï) := max (x n) 0

/-- If x_n ‚Üí l then max(x_n, 0) ‚Üí max(l, 0). -/
theorem tendsto_max_of_tendsto {l : ‚Ñù} (h : Tendsto x atTop (ùìù l)) :
  Tendsto (fun n => max (x n) 0) atTop (ùìù (max l 0)) := by sorry

/-- In particular, the limit of y_n = max(x_n,0) is ‚â• 0. -/
theorem lim_y_nonneg {l : ‚Ñù} (h : Tendsto x atTop (ùìù l)) :
  0 ‚â§ (max l 0) := by sorry

args.content:
import Mathlib

variable {x : ‚Ñï ‚Üí ‚Ñù}

def y (n : ‚Ñï) := max (x n) 0

/-- If x_n ‚Üí l then max(x_n, 0) ‚Üí max(l, 0). -/
theorem tendsto_max_of_tendsto (l : ‚Ñù) (h : Filter.Tendsto x Filter.atTop (nhds l)) :
  Filter.Tendsto (fun n => max (x n) 0) Filter.atTop (nhds (max l 0)) := by sorry

/-- In particular, the limit of y_n = max(x_n,0) is ‚â• 0. -/
theorem lim_y_nonneg (l : ‚Ñù) (h : Filter.Tendsto x Filter.atTop (nhds l)) :
  0 ‚â§ (max l 0) := by sorry
